Text:
HARD CODED SWEDISH SUBS.  Only download if you speak Swedish and need subs, or if you don't mind having Swedish subs on the screen the whole movie.  Quality is pretty decent, but it's an MPEG-2 DVD, not H.264 or DivX.  Don't understand why people continue to hard code their subs rather than just putting them in a separate track that can be turned off or on.

A9/V9 (worthless for me since I speak English)
